summary: In the days leading up to the 1936 Olympics, the fate of high jumper Gretel Bergmann hangs in the balance as it is decided whether or not a Jewish athlete can be a part of the German Olympic team.
cast: Karoline Herfurth|Sebastian Urzendowsky|Axel Prahl|Robert Gallinowski|Thomas Thieme|Johann von Bülow|August Zirner|Maria Happel|Franz Dinda|Leon Seidel|Marita Breuer|Rosa van de Loo|Otto Tausig|Elena Uhlig|John Keogh|Julie Engelbrecht|Klara Manzel|Martin Wissner|Matthias Redlhammer|Tomas Spencer|Adrian Zwicker|Angelika Bartsch|Harvey Friedman|Katrin Hansmeier|Isabell Brenner|André Lehnert|Philip Schwarz|Gretel Bergmann|Peter Clös|André Dietz|Adolf Hitler|Margaret Lambert|Julia Lukas|Armin Schmitt|Oliver Unkel
title: Berlin '36
